description: Enumeration of all possible zip file formats produced by bulk file download worker.

enum.name: CommandLineCache
enum.description: This is the default format.  Zip file format structure is: (<filehandle_id>%1000)/<filehandle_id>/<file_name>

enum.name: Flat
enum.description: Files are written to the zip 'flat' with no directory structure. Each file is named after the original file.  Duplicate file names are appended with a number in parenthesis to ensure all names are unique.
